name: Fire
introduction: Fires can cause severe damage and pose significant risks to life and property. Here's what you need to know to stay safe.
beforeFlood: Prepare an emergency kit and ensure your home has working smoke detectors.

steps.text: Evacuate immediately if you see fire or are directed to do so by authorities.
If trapped, stay low to the ground and cover your mouth with a wet cloth to avoid inhaling smoke.
Use the back of your hand to touch doors before opening them to ensure they are not hot.
If your clothes catch fire, stop, drop, and roll to extinguish the flames.
Once safe, call 911 and inform them of your location and the fire details.
